frame.name: Hair_configuration
frame.definition:
<def-root>Temporary or permanent Styles and Configurations of Hair, as well as its inherent Nature. Note that Attachment and Body Part will generally be incorporated in the lexical meanings. Subregions (e.g. roots, ends) are often not specified, and sometimes incorporated (e.g. in 'bangs')
<ex>On either side her head gleamed <fex name="Configuration">coiled</fex> <fex name="Configuration"><t>braids</t></fex> <fex name="Hair">of dark-gold hair</fex> , almost pale copper in the subdued light of the room .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Hair
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is the hair itself <ex>Her <fex name="Hair"><t>tresses</t></fex> were golden.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is the Possessor of the body part. <ex><fex name="Possessor">Michael's</fex> <t>hair</t> is long.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Subregion
FE.definition: <def-root>A subregion of the body part referred to by the target, e.g. <ex>Her <t>hair</t> is dark <fex name="Subregion">at the roots</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Configuration
FE.definition: <def-root>Temporary Configurations of hair (eg braid, bun, ponytail). Something done to the hair merely by movement. <ex>I pulled Michael's <fex name="Configuration">ponytail</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Hair_property
FE.definition: <def-root>A property of the hair (eg curly, fine, brown). This acts much like "Descriptor" in the Observable_bodyparts Frame. Colors, styles, natural properties are described by this frame element.</def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition: <def-root>Where the salient part of the hair is. <ex>His <t>hair</t> was <fex name="Location">in his eyes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Accessory
FE.definition: <def-root>Items that are put in the hair as part of a Configuration or Style <ex>She braided <fex name="Acc">ribbons</fex> into her hair.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: lock.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a) a piece of a person's hair that coils or hangs together. b) locks chiefly poetic/literary a person's hair.

lexUnit.name: tress.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a long lock of a woman's hair

lexUnit.name: curl.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: something in the shape of a spiral or coil, especially a lock of hair.

lexUnit.name: curl.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: form or cause to form a curved or spiral shape.

lexUnit.name: blond.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of hair) fair or pale yellow. Having fair hair and a pale complexion. Usually pertaining to males.

lexUnit.name: blonde.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of hair) fair or pale yellow. having fair hair and a light complexion.

lexUnit.name: pigtail.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a plaited lock of hair worn singly at the back or on each side of the head.

lexUnit.name: curly.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of hair): the characteristic of locks to naturally twist into ringlets

lexUnit.name: ponytail.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a hairstyle in which the hair is drawn back and tied at the back of the head.

lexUnit.name: plait.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a single length of hair, rope or other material made up of three or more interlaced strands.

lexUnit.name: braid.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a length of hair made up of three or more interlaced strands.

lexUnit.name: braided.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state of having the configuration of a braid.

lexUnit.name: topknot.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a knot of hair arranged on the top of the head.

lexUnit.name: wavy.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having or consisting of a series of wave-like curves.

lexUnit.name: wave.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: A slightly curling lock of hair. a tendency to curl in a person's hair.

lexUnit.name: hairdo.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: (informal) the style of a woman's hair.

lexUnit.name: golden.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: made of, coloured like, or shining like gold.

lexUnit.name: flaxen.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: (poetic/literary) (especially of hair) of the pale yellow colour of dressed flax.

lexUnit.name: styled.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: being designed or arranged in a particular way

lexUnit.name: hairstyle.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a way in which someone's hair is cut or arranged.

lexUnit.name: haircut.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the style in which someone's hair is cut.

lexUnit.name: cut.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the way or style in which a garment or the hair is cut.

lexUnit.name: cut.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of hair) styled in a certain way, as the result of a haircut.

lexUnit.name: cropped.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of hair) cut very short.

lexUnit.name: hair.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the collective hairs on someone's head.

lexUnit.name: part.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the separation of hair at the hairline
